directions: Toss all ingredients together in a bowl and let stand, stirring occasionally, 30 minutes, to blend flavors.
ingredients: 1/2 pineapple, peeled (reserving rind), cored, and coarsely chopped (2 cups)
2 tablespoons fresh pineapple juice, squeezed from reserved rind with your hands
1/4 to 1/2 teaspoon minced seeded habanero or Scotch bonnet chile
title: Pineapple Habanero Salsa
